description: A perfect recipe for a cosy night in, these juicy pork meatballs are served with a vibrant green curry paste, verdant veggies and tasty noodles.
keywords: Pork Meatballs with Green Curry Sauce
name: Pork Meatballs with Green Curry Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir lime juice into curry. Divide noodles among bowls. Spoon over curry. Top with remaining spinach and cashews,then serve with lime wedges.
